item.title: Modern Rendering engine
item.description: Modern Rendering engine Advanced Real-time Render Advances in Real-Time Rendering in 3D Graphics and Games Creating the Atmospheric World of Red Dead Redemption 2: A Complete and Integrated Solution atmosphere / clouds rendering Summary of articles/conferences on rendering games-cn conferences Real Time Rendering writing an efficient render extremely efficient render using vulkan 9 Core Rendering Engine Techniques Used in 3D Model Design Shading Shading is the process of producing levels of light, darkness, and color onto objects in a rendered image.
